plugin.name: Aardwolf_Stats_Grabber
plugin.author: Jyscal
plugin.description: Track levels, Gold, Trains and Pups gained during a session. Sessions can be started and stopped at any time and then exported to upload to AardStats Website

trigger.match: ^You raise a level! You are now level (.+).$
^You gain (.+) hit points, (.+) mana, (.+) moves, (.+) practices, (.+) trains and (.+) instinct trains.$
^Lucky! You gain an extra (.+) training sessions!$
^You are taxed (.+) gold coins by your clan.$

muclient.script:
local socket = require('socket')
local totalLevels = 0 local totalGold = 0 local totalTrains = 0 local totalPups = 0 local clanTax = 0 local startTime = 0.0 local endTime = 0.0
function tallyLevels(name, line, wildcards) if playerLevel == '200' or '201' then return end totalLevels = totalLevels + 1 end
function tallyGold(name, line, wildcards) levelGold = wildcards[1] totalGold = totalGold + tonumber(levelGold) end
function tallyTrains(name, line, wildcards) levelTrains = wildcards[1] totalTrains = totalTrains + tonumber(levelTrains) end
function tallyPups(name, line, wildcards) levelPups = wildcards[1] totalPups = totalPups + tonumber(levelPups) end
function tallyLucky(name, line, wildcards) luckyTrains = wildcards[1] totalTrains = totalTrains + tonumber(luckyTrains) end
function removeTax(name, line, wildcards) totalGold = totalGold - wildcards[1] end
function startTracking(name, line, wildcards) startTime = socket.gettime() - 3800
while true do
-- Get the time ellapsed and convert it to hours, minutes and seconds ellapsed = secondsEllapsed() hours = math.floor(ellapsed / 3600) minutes = math.floor((ellapsed - (hours * 3600)) / 60) seconds = math.floor((ellapsed - (hours * 3600) - (minutes * 60)))
-- Print the time ellapsed to the command line print(hours .. 'h', minutes .. 'm', seconds .. 's')
-- Wait a second between each update socket.sleep(1) end end
function secondsEllapsed(name, line, wildcards) return socket.gettime() - startTime end
function stopTracking(name, line, wildcards)
end
function resetSession(name, line, wildcards) totalLevels = 0 totalGold = 0 totalTrains = 0 totalPups = 0
ColourTell("white", "blue", "Session reset.") end
function exportStats(name, line, wildcards) nowTable = os.date('*t') nowYear = nowTable.year nowMonth = nowTable.month nowDay = nowTable.day exportDate = nowDay.."/"..nowMonth.."/"..nowYear
totalLevels = tostring(totalLevels) totalGold = tostring(totalGold) totalTrains = tostring(totalTrains) totalPups = tostring(totalPups)
file = io.open("C:/Users/cheryl/Desktop/stats_export.txt", "w+") file:write(exportDate..","..totalLevels..","..totalGold..","..totalTrains..","..totalPups) file:close()
ColourTell("white", "blue", "Stats have been exported succesfully.") end
function OnPluginInstall() if GetVariable ("enabled") == "false" then ColourNote ("yellow", "", "Warning: Plugin " .. GetPluginName ().. " is currently disabled.") check (EnablePlugin(GetPluginID (), false)) return end
function OnPluginEnable() send "Plugin loaded successfully" end
function OnPluginDisable()
end
function OnPluginSaveState()
end
